amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the irrigation district to pay fair market value for the property and facilities; and determine the market value by a panel of three appraisers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the Oroville-Tonasket Irrigation District in the State of Washington to pay the Federal Government fair market value (based upon an impartial panel of appraisers) for property and facilities proposed to be transfered from the Bureau of Reclamation to the irrigation district.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (CA) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 232 (Roll no. 51).
